AppConfigForm.appIconHelperText: Displayed on users' home screen. Recommended size: 1024x1024.
AppConfigForm.appIconTooltip: Submit any image if unsure. We can assist with design refinements.
AppConfigForm.fontFamilyTooltip: Pick from Google Fonts or 'randomize' for an unexpected selection.
AppConfigForm.nameHelperText: Defines both app name and URL:
AppConfigForm.nameTooltip: Usually your business name. URL is updated immediately upon change, app name update requires store submission.
AppConfigForm.seedColorTooltip: We derive shades from this color, creating a cohesive theme for both light and dark modes. Adjust or 'randomize' to explore!
AppConfigForm.themeModeHelperText: 'Auto' respects user's device settings. 'Light' or 'Dark' overrides it.
AppConfigForm.themeModeTooltip: 'Light' for a bright theme, 'Dark' for muted visuals, 'Auto' syncs with device preferences.
AppConfigForm.useMaterial3Tooltip: Activate 'contemporary' for sleeker, updated design attributes.

CatalogAccordion.dragHandleTooltip: Drag and drop to reorder in-app
CatalogAccordion.fileNotFoundError: File missing. Retry or contact support if the issue continues.
CatalogAccordion.fileTooLargeError: File exceeds the limit. Keep it under 250 MB.
CatalogAccordion.invalidFileError: Unsupported file type. Ensure it's JPEG, PJPEG, PNG, or GIF.
CatalogAccordion.switchTooltip: Toggle to enable or disable in-app

ComingSoonComponent.description: We are working hard to bring MyOrderApp to you. Stay tuned!
ComingSoonComponent.title: Coming Soon!

DashboardComponent.appConfigEnabledTooltip: Toggle to enable or disable ordering. Useful for holidays or sudden closures.
DashboardComponent.moneyAmountTooltip: Total revenue from app orders within the date range.
DashboardComponent.moneyAppFeeAmountTooltip: Total MyOrderApp transactions fees paid out within the date range.
DashboardComponent.moneyTaxAmountTooltip: Total sales tax collected within the date range.
DashboardComponent.moneyTipAmountTooltip: Total tips collected within the date range.
DashboardComponent.orderCountTooltip: Total orders within the selected date range.

DeleteMerchantMeDialog.content: Are you certain you wish to delete your account? This irreversible action will erase all your data, including customer accounts and order history. While we'll maintain minimal records for legal reasons, restoring your account won't be feasible. Please confirm this final step by entering your email address below.
DeleteMerchantMeDialog.title: Delete Account

ads.details: For the Free version, the advertisements you see are predominantly sourced from Google Ads.
ads.summary: What kind of ads will appear on the Free version?

billing.details: We've partnered with Stripe to facilitate all our billing procedures. Upon initiating your subscription, an immediate charge is applied, followed by monthly charges thereafter.
billing.summary: What payment methods are accepted and when am I billed?

cost.details: Pricing is largely contingent on the fees associated with opening an Apple Developer Account in your specific region. For instance, in the US, EU, Australia, and Canada the rate is $99/month. In the UK, it's $79/month, and in Japan, 11,800 yen/month. Your inaugural month, or 'publishing month', encompasses the establishment of your account, material uploads, and app approval. This initial payment primarily facilitates the publishing phase, and in most cases, your app will be live before the month concludes. Typically, app approvals are completed in under 48 hours.
cost.summary: How is the cost determined for the Pro version?

downgrading.details: Upon downgrading, your app will revert to an ad-supported model. For any future updates, self-publishing to the app stores becomes mandatory. Additionally, premium support and app publishing services will no longer be accessible.
downgrading.summary: What happens when I downgrade from Pro to Free?

publishing.details: Although you'll be provided with a direct link to download your app, self-publishing to the app stores will be necessary. Don't fret; we'll supply detailed guidance to streamline this process.
publishing.summary: Do I need technical skills for the Free tier?

support.details: Free version users can anticipate support when available. In contrast, our Pro tier subscribers enjoy the luxury of round-the-clock developer support, with a guaranteed response time within 48 hours.
support.summary: What kind of support can I expect?

switching.details: Absolutely. Begin with our Free tier and if you find you'd like more comprehensive support or prefer an ad-free experience, transition to our Pro tier. Conversely, if your needs change, you can revert from Pro to Free. Please note, switching to the Free version will reintroduce ads and necessitate self-publishing.

upgrading.details: It's seamless! Whenever you're ready, simply visit your Account page to make the switch.
upgrading.summary: How easy is it to upgrade from Free to Pro?

LocationsComponent.title: Locations
LocationsComponent.tooltipTitle: Selectively disable ordering for specific locations. Useful for holidays or sudden closures.

MaintenanceComponent.description: Our site is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance. We apologize for any inconvenience and will be back soon!
MaintenanceComponent.title: Under Maintenance

NotFoundComponent.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
NotFoundComponent.title: Page Not Found

PasswordForgotForm.successAlert: Your message has been sent. We'll get back to you shortly.

PasswordResetForm.resetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been reset. You can now log in.

SetupAppConfigDialog.content: Congratulations on taking your first step to publishing your mobile ordering application on web, Android, and iOS! On the left, define your app's identity with a name, icon, font, and color theme. On the right, witness a live preview populated with placeholders. Feel uncertain about a selection? Relax; you can refine later. Before launch, we'll touch base to ensure everything's perfect. Once you sync with Square, you'll be able to see your catalog and make a test order if you'd like. Excited to dive in?
SetupAppConfigDialog.title: Welcome to MyOrderApp for Sellers!

SetupCatalogComponent.tooltip: Reorder categories and items via drag-and-drop. Turn off the switch to remove from the app. Click an item to reveal and modify its details. Changes in your Square catalog will auto-update here.

SetupCatalogDialog.content: Great progress on your app setup and Square integration! Now, let's fine-tune your catalog. Drag and drop for order preference, tap to reveal Category Items and Variations, and use the toggle to enable or disable specific entries. Add a touch of flair by using the '+' button to upload images, which will display in-app. Remember, any updates in Square will automatically sync here. All set to get started?
SetupCatalogDialog.title: Your Catalog Awaits!

SetupSquareOauthComponent.fallbackError: Oops, something went wrong. Don't worry, your data is safe. We've been notified and are working to fix the issue.

SquareOauthExplainerCard.catalogSyncSecondary: Authorize our application to fetch your catalog, ensuring a seamless integration with your current product listings.
SquareOauthExplainerCard.dataSecuritySecondary: Your data is protected by Square's security measures. You can manage or revoke permissions anytime from your Square Dashboard.
SquareOauthExplainerCard.orderSubmissionSecondary: Allow us to submit orders on your customers' behalf, ensuring quick and smooth order processing.
SquareOauthExplainerCard.posIntegrationSecondary: Send orders directly to your point-of-sale systems, bridging the gap between online orders and in-person sales.
SquareOauthExplainerCard.title: Authorize us to access Square

StripeCheckoutCancelledCard.body: Life gets busy, and we understand that. Should you choose to return and finalize your setup, know that your progress is saved. At any point, you can revisit previous steps using the navigation above. For any queries or more insights, our FAQ section and publishing options are readily available below.
StripeCheckoutCancelledCard.title: We noticed your checkout was interrupted

SupportRequestForm.subjectPlaceholder: e.g., Billing, Technical Issue, General Query
SupportRequestForm.successAlert: Your message has been sent. We'll get back to you shortly.
SupportRequestForm.textPlaceholder: The more details you provide, the quicker we can help

Tier0CheckoutCard.perfectForBody: Small businesses just starting with mobile ordering and focused on having a web-only presence.
Tier0CheckoutCard.title: Free

Tier0SuccessCard.nextStepsSecondary: Check your performance analytics and tweak your marketing accordingly. Want more? Upgrading is seamless for an even more robust experience.
Tier0SuccessCard.subheader: Way to go! Your web app is fully functional and ready to accept orders.
Tier0SuccessCard.supportSecondary: Stuck? Don't hesitate to use our basic support. Expect a reply within 72 hours.
Tier0SuccessCard.title: Your Web App is Live!

Tier1CheckoutCard.perfectForBody: Growing businesses aiming for an Android presence and desiring a vanity URL.
Tier1CheckoutCard.title: Starter

Tier1SuccessCard.nextStepsSecondary: Kickstart your promotional efforts for the web app and brace for the Android launch. We're on top of the tech, so you focus on sales.
Tier1SuccessCard.subheader: Success! Your web app is operational. Sit tight; your Android app will be rolling out shortly.
Tier1SuccessCard.supportSecondary: Got Queries? Our enhanced support guarantees a 48-hour turnaround for your questions.
Tier1SuccessCard.title: Web and Android—Coming Soon!

Tier2CheckoutCard.perfectForBody: Established businesses looking for a premium, multi-platform experience with zero transaction fees.
Tier2CheckoutCard.supportSecondary: Live support from our development team, response within 24 hours.
Tier2CheckoutCard.title: Complete

Tier2SuccessCard.nextStepsSecondary: Maximize your web app's visibility while we finalize your Android and iOS apps. Your cross-platform strategy is about to level up.
Tier2SuccessCard.subheader: Splendid! Your web app is live and serving customers. Android and iOS versions are in the pipeline.
Tier2SuccessCard.supportSecondary: Need Prompt Assistance? Our priority support offers a 24-hour live response from our dev team.
Tier2SuccessCard.title: The Full Package—Web, Android, and iOS!
